question:
You are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems.
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter:


explain your situation

describe your problems

tell him/her when you think you can start

Write at least 150 words.


You do NOT need to write any addresses.


Begin your letter as follows:


Dear Sir or Madam,
text: I was supposed to start working with your company from next week, but some problems are holding me back on the same. This is because my previous employer is putting me in a strange situation, and not releasing me.
Firstly, they are not accepting the hand-over provided by me, mentioning irrelavant reasons. This is causing me to extend the work period with them.

Secondly, the Human Resource Department is delaying my settlement. Since I was working with them for a period of more than 10 years, they owe me a reasonably large sum, with which I had plans to close my car loan.

I think it will take a minimum period of atleast 2 more weeks for me to solve these problems. Hence, I appreciate if you could allow me to delay my joining date for the above period. I hope you will accept this letter and extend me your support on the matter.
